ithihasaye wadima mudal pramanaya kaluthara disthrikkaye sanwardhanaya sadaha labune me awurudde di bawath janadhipathi thuma wisin 2014 ayawaya yojana mangin shri lankawe sama disthrikkayak sandahama wishala mudal pramanayak laba dimata katayuthu kara thibena bawath aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage meheya wima matha sanwardhana katayuthu siduwena bawath kaluthara disthrik lekam yu.di. si. jayalal mahatha prakasha kaleya.kaluthara disthrik lekam waraya mema karunu prakasha kale kaluthara disthrik madhya eekakaye mulikathwayen sanwidhana kara thibu kaluthara pradeshiya warthakaruwan ha pawathi prawruththi sakachchawedi ya.kaluthara disthrik lekam karyalayedi pawathi mema prawruththi sakachchawedi kaluthara disthrikkaye siyaluma kshethrayanta ayath sanwardhana wadasatahan wala pragathiya idiripath karana ladi.kaluthara disthrik lekam yu.di. si. jayalal mahatha athulu rajya aayathana pradhanin ha kaluthara disthrik madhya eekakaye prawruththi niladhari shantha priya mahatha athulu kaluthara pradeshiya warthakaruwoda mema prawruththi sakachchawata sahabhagi wuha.
